document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Nine Steps and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Street of Nine Steps
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Nine Steps''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Nine Steps was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road branched east from [[Caravan Street]] just south of [[Tilman's Lane]], turned south, east, then north through a small neighborhood, and eventually ended on [[Wall Street]] near the [[Trollwall]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Old Monster Shop]] was located on the eastern end of the Street of Nine Steps.
